Room.Name: The Red Training Room
Room.ShortDescription: You have entered the Red Training Room. In order to advance to the next level, you must defeat the red knight in hand-to-hand, one-on-one combat.
Room.LongDescription: The Red Warrior stands before you, waiting for your first move. He is very experienced, and has dashed the hopes of many young warriors who were not really ready for the added responsibilities of the next level. Once you defeat the Red Warrior, you may train for Warrior, First Class.
